page.title: 07JANE HODGE HOME
page.content: The{Jane Hodge Holiday Home,}built in 1968,is a short stay residential home for the handicapped,nr.Trerhyngyll. The idea behind the home is to provide a holiday giving a change of environment for handicapped people & also gives relatives a break.A maximum of 28 can be accomodated during each holiday period & the home is named after banker Julian Hodge's mother. Guests sleep in dormitories & throughout their stay are in the care of staff working 24 hrs. on a shift basis.There is a Hydrotherapy pool, well equipped playroom, music/TV room, lake, putting green & croquet. Different weeks are reserved for physically & mentally handicapped, also children & adults.The Home is open from June to September.The cost for a weeks stay per guest is about Â£300.
